name: Passed Out: Prologue
description:
THIS IS THE SINGLE PLAYER VERSION OF THE GAME

Battle Royale

Survive against not only AI players, but also over 2000 creatures surrounding the zone and coming for YOU !

Be the last person standing and eliminate a maximum of creatures to maximize your final score.

Zombie Horde Mode

Once you are the last person standing, the game isn’t over yet. Creatures will chase and you will need to run for your life in order to survive until you manage to catch the helicopter to escape.

Your score will be calculated based on the number of creatures and players you managed to eliminate, as well as whether you’ve successfully escaped !
